xrefdescription.para: No-Operation Command

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This command will increment the command execution counter and send an event containing the version number of the application. The command is often used as a general test for application "aliveness".

detaileddescription.para:
Command Structure
DS_NoopCmd_t Command Verification
Evidence of success may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDPC - command execution counter will increment
The DS_NOOP_CMD_EID informational event message will be sent
Error Conditions
This command can fail for the following reasons:
Invalid command packet length
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_NOOP_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

xrefdescription.para: Reset Housekeeping Telemetry Counters Command

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para:
This command will set the following housekeeping counters to zero:
Command Execution Counter ($sc_$cpu_DS_CMDPC)
Command Error Counter ($sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC)
Ignored Packet Counter ($sc_$cpu_DS_IgnoredPktCnt)
Filtered Packet Counter ($sc_$cpu_DS_FilteredPktCnt)
Passed Packet Counter ($sc_$cpu_DS_PassedPktCnt)
File Access Counter ($sc_$cpu_DS_FileWriteCnt)
File Access Error Counter ($sc_$cpu_DS_FileWriteErrCnt)
Destination Table Load Counter ($sc_$cpu_DS_DestLoadCnt)
Filter Table Load Counter ($sc_$cpu_DS_FilterLoadCnt)
Destination Table Ptr Error Counter ($sc_$cpu_DS_DestPtrErrCnt)
Filter Table Ptr Error Counter ($sc_$cpu_DS_FilterPtrErrCnt)

detaileddescription.para:
Command Structure
DS_ResetCmd_t Command Verification
Evidence of success may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDPC - command execution counter will increment
The DS_RESET_CMD_EID debug event message will be sent
Error Conditions
This command can fail for the following reasons:
Invalid command packet length
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_RESET_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

xrefdescription.para: Set Enable/Disable State For DS Application

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This command will modify the Ena/Dis State selection for the DS application. No packets are stored while DS is disabled.

xrefdescription.para: $sc_$cpu_DS_Enable (fixed command arg = enable)
$sc_$cpu_DS_Disable (fixed command arg = disable)

detaileddescription.para:
Command Structure
DS_AppStateCmd_t Command Verification
Evidence of success may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDPC - command execution counter will increment
The DS_ENADIS_CMD_EID debug event message will be sent
Error Conditions
This command can fail for the following reasons:
Invalid command packet length
Invalid enable/disable state selection
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_ENADIS_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

xrefdescription.para: Set Destination File For Packet Filter Table Entry

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This command will modify the Destination File selection for the indicated entry in the Packet Filter Table.

detaileddescription.para:
Command Structure
DS_FilterFileCmd_t Command Verification
Evidence of success may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDPC - command execution counter will increment
The DS_FILE_CMD_EID debug event message will be sent
Error Conditions
This command can fail for the following reasons:
Invalid command packet length
Invalid filter table index
Invalid filter parameters index
Invalid destination file selection
Packet filter table is not currently loaded
Cannot modify unused packet filter table entry
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_FILE_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

xrefdescription.para: Set Filter Type For Packet Filter Table Entry

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This command will modify the Filter Type selection for the indicated entry in the Packet Filter Table.

detaileddescription.para:
Command Structure
DS_FilterTypeCmd_t Command Verification
Evidence of success may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDPC - command execution counter will increment
The DS_FTYPE_CMD_EID debug event message will be sent
Error Conditions
This command can fail for the following reasons:
Invalid command packet length
Invalid filter table index
Invalid filter parameters index
Invalid filter type selection
Packet filter table is not currently loaded
Cannot modify unused packet filter table entry
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_FTYPE_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

xrefdescription.para: Set Algorithm Parameters For Packet Filter Table Entry

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This command will modify the Algorithm Parameters for the indicated entry in the Packet Filter Table.

detaileddescription.para:
Command Structure
DS_FilterParmsCmd_t Command Verification
Evidence of success may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDPC - command execution counter will increment
The DS_PARMS_CMD_EID debug event message will be sent
Error Conditions
This command can fail for the following reasons:
Invalid command packet length
Invalid filter table index
Invalid filter parameters index
Algorithm_N value cannot be greater than Algorithm_X
Packet filter table is not currently loaded
Cannot modify unused packet filter table entry
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_PARMS_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

The DS_NTYPE_CMD_EID debug event message will be sent
Error Conditions

Invalid filename type selection
Destination file table is not currently loaded
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_NTYPE_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.title: Criticality

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This command will modify the Ena/Dis State selection for the indicated entry in the Destination File Table.

xrefdescription.para: $sc_$cpu_DS_EnableFile (fixed command arg = enable)
$sc_$cpu_DS_DisableFile (fixed command arg = disable)

detaileddescription.para:

DS_DestStateCmd_t Command Verification
Evidence of success may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDPC - command execution counter will increment
The DS_STATE_CMD_EID debug event message will be sent
Error Conditions
This command can fail for the following reasons:
Invalid command packet length
Invalid destination file table index
Invalid destination state selection
Destination file table is not currently loaded
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_STATE_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

xrefdescription.para: Set Pathname For Destination File Table Entry

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This command will modify the Pathname portion of the filename for the indicated entry in the Destination File Table.

detaileddescription.para:
Command Structure
DS_DestPathCmd_t Command Verification
Evidence of success may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDPC - command execution counter will increment
The DS_PATH_CMD_EID debug event message will be sent
Error Conditions
This command can fail for the following reasons:
Invalid command packet length
Invalid destination file table index
Invalid pathname string (empty, no terminator, bad characters)
Destination file table is not currently loaded
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_PATH_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

Destination file table is not currently loaded
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_BASE_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.para: This command will close the indicated Destination File.

The DS_CLOSE_CMD_EID debug event message will be sent

xrefdescription.para: Get File Info Packet

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This command will send the DS File Info Packet.

detaileddescription.para:
Command Structure
DS_GetFileInfoCmd_t Command Verification
Evidence of success may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDPC - command execution counter will increment
The DS_FileInfoPkt_t packet will be sent
Error Conditions
This command can fail for the following reasons:
Invalid command packet length
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_GET_FILE_INFO_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

xrefdescription.para: Add Message ID To Packet Filter Table

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This command will change the Message ID selection for an unused Packet Filter Table entry to the indicated value.

detaileddescription.para:
Command Structure
DS_AddMidCmd_t Command Verification
Evidence of success may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDPC - command execution counter will increment
The DS_ADD_MID_CMD_EID debug event message will be sent
Error Conditions
This command can fail for the following reasons:
Invalid command packet length
Message ID is invalid (can be anything but zero)
Packet filter table is not currently loaded
Message ID already exists in packet filter table
All packet filter table entries are already in use
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_ADD_MID_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None

xrefdescription.para: Close All Destination Files

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para:
This command will close all open Destination Files.
NOTE: Using this command may incur a performance hit based upon the number and size of the files being closed.

detaileddescription.para:
Command Structure
DS_CloseAllCmd_t Command Verification
Evidence of success may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDPC - command execution counter will increment
The DS_CLOSE_ALL_CMD_EID debug event message will be sent
Error Conditions
This command can fail for the following reasons:
Invalid command packet length
Destination file table is not currently loaded
Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_DS_CMDEC - command error counter will increment
The DS_CLOSE_ALL_CMD_ERR_EID error event message will be sent

simplesect.title: Criticality
simplesect.para: None
